reference.title: I want to change the view
reference.shortdesc: Instead of seeing the nodes displayed in a hierarchical diagram, a radial or indented diagram is displayed.

refbody.section: ProblemBy default, when you install , the indented diagram view is selected. You need to select the hierarchical diagram view.
SolutionTo ensure that the DITA map is displayed as a hierarchical diagram, click View View As Hierarchical Diagram.
